game.name: PAYDAY 2: Sokol Character Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Though young, Sokol has everything to become a legendary heister.The Sokol Character Pack is the 25th DLC for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to play as Sokol the Russian, the Grinder of the PAYDAY gang. Other than Sokol himself, it includes the Grinder perk deck, Sokol's mask, Sokol's hockey stick mel
